channel.title: Adding a login message
channel.description: I want to add a message like whenever a staff member logs in it'll say: Mod/Admin so and so has logged in. not sure on how I'd code this. Hybrid based..

item.title: Adding a login message
item.dc:creator: @xX_CoDeR_AJ xX CoDeR AJ
item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

if I put it there it registers the login 100+ times.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a login message
item.dc:creator: @Bandos1337 Bandos1337
item.description:
@Bandos1337 wrote:

Here you go
Put this in Client.java, found in your server folder. Search for this in the text:
Misc.println("[REGISTERED]: “+playerName+”");
…and on the line below that put…

if (playerRights == 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; o.sendMessage("[@blu@Mod@bla@] "+playerName+" has logged in!"); } } if (playerRights == 2) { for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; o.sendMessage("[@dre@Admin@bla@] "+playerName+" has logged in!"); } } if (playerRights == 3) { for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; o.sendMessage("[@red@Owner@bla@] "+playerName+" has logged in!"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a login message

item.description:
@xX_CoDeR_AJ wrote:

its a PI base by Hybrid PVP v1.
like whenever an admin logs in or a mod, I want it to say "Moderator/Admin “playername” has logged in!

item.title: Adding a login message
item.dc:creator: @Bandos1337 Bandos1337
item.description:
@Bandos1337 wrote:

Hybrid based? never heard of that before. You use c.sendMessage() or c.sM()? If its PI i can help you, if not i cant.
